page.title: 10 Farming
page.content: I have been finding out about my father's job. His farm covers {200 acres} altogether.He has{40 acres}of corn{18 of barley{12}of oats and{10}of wheat.He makes hay and about a field of silage.He does arable and stock farming.He has{one}workman.He has seven tractors the models are a{Ford {7000,Ford 8000,County,Roaless,I.H.574 another{I.H.574}and a{M.F.20.}His combine is an International.He goes contracting with the combine.There are very big problems in the winter with pipes freezing up, big snow drifts and animals dying from the cold.He sells his stock at{Ludlow}auction.He starts combining in{August,}lambing in{ {February,}haymaking in{June.}He does calving all the year round.Potatoes are also grown.Dairy cows are not kept.
